attributes.action: Issue an ASBO against the Government and ASH regarding the Smoking Ban
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Yes I can see smoking as anti-social to non smokers.
But does that give the right to the Government and Anti smoking groups to stop smokers Socializing.
Take a walk round any town/city and look at the pub windows, you will see smoke room etched or in stained glass of them.
If the Victorians could segregate smokers and non-smokers why can't we?
Government is trying to recreate communities and by banning smoking it has segregated them. 
Smokers young and old now find it easeir to stay at home and drink and smoke.
Surely this is anti-social!
